TEXT.TITLE: DANISH FEBRUARY CONSUMER PRICES FALL 0.1 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Consumer prices fell 0.1 pct in February, after a rise of 0.2 pct in January and no change in February 1986, the National Statistics Office said. The index, base 1980, fell to 154.5 in February from 154.6 in January, against 147.4 in February 1986, giving a year-on-year increase of 4.8 pct. REUTER
